author: Brian Wang
title: USA Coronavirus Deaths Passes 20,000 and Is World’s Highest
description: The USA became the first nation to record more than 2,000 virus deaths in a single day and total US COVID-19 deaths are over 20,000. New York is nearing 10,000 deaths. SOURCES- Worldometers.info, BBC... [[ This is a content summary only. Visit my website for …
content:
The USA became the first nation to record more than 2,000 virus deaths in a single day and total US COVID-19 deaths are over 20,000.
New York is nearing 10,000 deaths.
SOURCES- Worldometers.info, BBC News.comWritten By Brian Wang, Nextbigfuture.com
